casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Milton Leroy LAWRENCE. No. 122P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of August 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31(c)":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
